sourcesContent:
<template>
   
          
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        services: [
          {
            name: "Haircut",
            description: "Experience a fresh, stylish haircut.",
          },
          {
            name: "Facial",
            description: "Revitalize your skin with a relaxing facial.",
          },
          {
            name: "Massage",
            description: "Relax your body with a soothing massage.",
          },
          // Add more services as needed
        ],
        dialogVisible: false,
        selectedService: null,
      };
    },
    methods: {
      bookService(serviceName) {
        this.selectedService = serviceName;
        this.dialogVisible = true;
      },
      handleBooking() {
        console.log(`Service '${this.selectedService}' booked successfully!`);
        this.dialogVisible = false;
        // Redirect or show confirmation
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .client-page {
    background-image: url('@/assets/saloon.jpg'); /* Path to your background image */
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-attachment: fixed;
    color: white;
    min-height: 100vh;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .overlay-tint {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* Apply a dark tint over the background */
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
  }
  
  .service-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    z-index: 2;
  }
  
  .service-card {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); /* Add a slight black background to card */
    color: white;
    border-radius: 15px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    width: 300px;
    margin: 20px;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  
  .service-card:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  
  .service-card-bg {
    position: relative;
    height: 300px;
  }
  
  .service-card-title {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
    padding: 15px;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  
  .service-card-subtitle {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .service-card-actions {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
    padding: 15px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .book-btn {
    background-color: gold;
    color: black;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .book-btn:hover {
    background-color: darkgoldenrod;
  }
  
  .dialog-overlay {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 1000;
  }
  
  .dialog {
    background-color: black;
    color: white;
    padding: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    width: 400px;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .dialog-title {
    font-size: 22px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .dialog-text {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .dialog-actions {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-around;
  }
  
  .dialog-btn {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .dialog-btn.cancel {
    background-color: red;
  }
  
  .dialog-btn.cancel:hover {
    background-color: darkred;
  }
  
  .dialog-btn.confirm {
    background-color: gold;
    color: black;
  }
  
  .dialog-btn.confirm:hover {
    background-color: darkgoldenrod;
  }
  </style>
